item.title: UAW 称阿拉巴马州梅赛德斯奔驰工厂工人申请参加工会选举
item.description: 位于阿拉巴马州万斯的梅赛德斯奔驰工厂的工人向美国监管机构提交了一份请愿书，要求举行选举以加入美国汽车工人工会（United Auto Workers）。【原文：Workers at a Mercedes Benz factory in Vance, Alabama, filed a petition with U.S. regulators to hold an election to join the United Auto Workers, the union said on Friday.】

item.title: 元全面修订关于深度伪造和其他篡改媒体的规则
item.description: 在美国大选之前，Facebook 的所有者 Meta 周五宣布对其有关数字创建和篡改媒体的政策进行重大调整，这将考验其对新人工智能技术产生的欺骗性内容进行监管的能力。【原文：Facebook owner Meta announced major changes to its policies on digitally created and altered media on Friday, ahead of U.S. elections poised to test its ability to police deceptive content generated by new artificial intelligence technologies.】

item.title: 安联以 14 亿美元出售美国保险部门
item.description: 德国保险公司安联（Allianz）周五表示，同意以 14 亿美元的价格将其面向中型企业和娱乐业客户的美国保险部门 Fireman's Fund 出售给 Arch Insurance。【原文：Allianz agreed to sell Fireman's Fund, its U.S. insurance unit for mid-sized corporations and entertainment industry clients, to Arch Insurance for $1.4 billion, the German insurer said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国 3 月就业人数好于预期；工资稳步增长
item.description: 美国雇主在 3 月份雇佣的工人数量远超预期，同时还提高了工资，这表明第一季度的经济基础稳固，并有可能推迟美联储今年的降息预期。【原文：U.S. employers hired far more workers than expected March while raising wages, suggesting the economy ended the first quarter on solid ground and potentially delaying anticipated interest rate cuts from the Federal Reserve this year.】

item.title: 降息时机不明朗，全球股票基金资金外流
item.description: 在截至4月3日的一周里，投资者减持了全球股票基金，因为他们权衡了在美国经济报告强劲、劳动力需求稳健的情况下，美联储降息次数可能少于预期的可能性。【原文：Investors trimmed their holdings in global equity funds in the week ending April 3 as they weighed the possibility of the Federal Reserve delivering fewer interest rate cuts than expected, amid strong U.S. economic reports and solid labor demand.】

item.title: WiWo 报道称，美国商人是竞购破产德国连锁商场的买家之一
item.description: 据商业媒体 WirtschaftsWoche 周五报道，美国商人理查德-贝克（Richard Baker）的投资公司（NRDC）是德国最著名的连锁百货公司 Galeria Karstadt Kaufhof 的两个剩余竞标者之一。【原文：The investment firm of US businessman Richard Baker (NRDC) is among the two remaining bidders for Germany's most prominent department store chain Galeria Karstadt Kaufhof, business outlet WirtschaftsWoche reported on Friday.】

item.title: 壳牌与阿美石油公司展馆能源谈判进入最后阶段--消息人士
item.description: 三位知情人士称，壳牌和沙特阿美正在竞相收购淡马锡旗下液化天然气（LNG）贸易公司 Pavilion Energy 的资产，在完成尽职调查程序后，双方目前正在进行价格谈判。【原文：Shell and Saudi Aramco , which are competing to buy the assets of Temasek-owned liquefied natural gas (LNG) trading firm Pavilion Energy, are now locked in price negotiations after completing the due diligence process, three sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美国 3 月份就业增长超出预期；工资稳步增长
item.description: 美国雇主在 3 月份雇佣的工人数量远超预期，同时还提高了工资，这表明第一季度的经济基础稳固，并有可能推迟美联储今年的降息预期。【原文：U.S. employers hired far more workers than expected March while raising wages, suggesting the economy ended the first quarter on solid ground and potentially delaying anticipated interest rate cuts from the Federal Reserve this year.】

item.title: 美国和欧盟在新的半导体协议中盯上了中国的传统芯片
item.description: 美国和欧盟承诺将合作期限延长三年，以查明半导体行业的干扰因素，并特别强调来自中国的主流 "传统 "芯片。【原文：The United States and the European Union committed to extend by three years their cooperation on identifying disruptions in the semiconductor sector, with a particular emphasis on mainstream "legacy" chips from China.】

item.title: 商业团体投诉后，印尼审查进口规则
item.description: 印尼贸易部一位高级官员周五表示，印尼正在评估旨在抑制3000多种产品进口的法规，因为业界担心这些法规可能会扰乱国内供应链并影响出口。【原文：Indonesia is evaluating regulations designed to curb imports of more than 3,000 products, a senior trade ministry official said on Friday, following industry concerns the rules could disrupt the domestic supply chain and disrupt exports.】

item.title: 数据显示，英国金融业女性的收入比男性同事少三分之一
item.description: 路透社查阅的 21 家公司的薪酬数据显示，英国一些顶级金融公司支付给女性的薪酬平均比男性少 28.8%，尽管这些公司表示正在努力聘用更多女性担任高薪、高级职位。【原文：Some of Britain's top financial firms pay women 28.8% less on average than male counterparts, salary data from 21 companies reviewed by Reuters shows, even though they say they are striving to hire more females for higher-paid, senior roles.】

item.title: 尽管闪电般上涨，黄金多头仍期待再创新高
item.description: 本周，瑞士黄金精炼厂 MKS PAMP 金属战略主管尼基-希尔斯（Nicky Shiels）对 2024 年金价预测的上调引来了市场参与者意想不到的追问。这个问题是"黄金是否会'变可可'？【原文：An upgraded gold price forecast for 2024 from Nicky Shiels, head of metals strategy at Swiss gold refinery MKS PAMP, drew an unexpected follow-up question this week from market participants. The enquiry was: "Will or can gold 'go cocoa'?"】

item.title: 一次险些失手的网络攻击为何让美国官员和科技行业人心惶惶？
item.description: 德国软件开发人员安德烈斯-弗罗因德（Andres Freund）上个月在进行一些详细的性能测试时，发现一个鲜为人知的程序出现了奇怪的行为。他在调查中发现的情况令整个软件世界为之震惊，并引起了技术主管和政府官员的关注。【原文：German software developer Andres Freund was running some detailed performance tests last month when he noticed odd behavior in a little known program. What he found when he investigated has sent shudders across the software world and drawn attention from tech executives and government officials.】

item.title: 意大利顶级银行股价对账面价值的折让收窄
item.description: 意大利银行的股价已飙升至多年来的高点，因为利率上升使利润激增，贷款成本上升，而存款利率却远远落后。【原文：Italian banks have seen their share prices soar to multi-year highs as rising interest rates turbocharge profits, driving up lending costs while deposit rates lag far behind.】

item.title: 阿玛尼集团公司因劳工剥削调查被接管
item.description: 意大利一家法院周五对意大利时装集团阿玛尼旗下的一家公司实施司法管理，原因是该公司间接将生产分包给剥削工人的中国公司。【原文：An Italian court on Friday placed under judicial administration a company owned by Italian fashion group Armani for indirectly subcontracting its production to Chinese companies that exploited workers.】

item.title: 强生公司将以 125 亿美元收购冲击波医疗公司
item.description: 强生公司（Johnson & Johnson）周五同意以 125 亿美元的价格收购冲击波医疗公司（Shockwave Medical），这笔交易将有助于扩大其用于治疗心脏病的医疗设备产品组合。【原文：Johnson & Johnson on Friday agreed to buy Shockwave Medical for $12.5 billion, in a deal that would help broaden its portfolio of medical devices used in treating heart diseases.】

item.title: 在薪资测试前，期货从华尔街大跌中回升
item.description: 在美联储官员就降息发表鹰派言论导致股市暴跌一天后，周五美国股指期货上涨，同时投资者为一份可能有助于塑造货币政策前景的关键就业报告做好准备。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Friday, a day after equities slumped on hawkish remarks from Federal Reserve officials on interest rate cuts, while investors braced for a key jobs report that could help shape the monetary policy outlook.】

item.title: 欧盟反垄断监管机构撤销对时装设计师的调查
item.description: 欧盟委员会周五表示，欧盟反垄断监管机构以 "优先考虑的原因 "为由，取消了对一群时装设计师长达两年的调查，这些设计师曾呼吁改变销售期和折扣。【原文：EU antitrust regulators have scrapped a two-year-long investigation into a group of fashion designers who had called for changes in sales periods and discounts, the European Commission said on Friday, citing "priority reasons".】

item.title: 洞察：大科技公司购买人工智能训练数据的地下竞赛内幕
item.description: Photobucket 在本世纪初达到顶峰时，曾是世界顶级图片托管网站。作为 Myspace 和 Friendster 等热门服务的媒体支柱，它拥有 7000 万用户，几乎占据了美国在线图片市场的半壁江山。【原文：At its peak in the early 2000s, Photobucket was the world's top image-hosting site. The media backbone for once-hot services like Myspace and Friendster, it boasted 70 million users and accounted for nearly half of the U.S. online photo market.】

item.title: Terraform 实验室向陪审团做最后陈述，民事欺诈审判即将结束
item.description: Terraform Labs 及其创始人 Do Kwon 的律师预计将在周五的庭审中进行结案陈词，该案指控 Terraform 和 Kwon 在 2022 年稳定币崩盘震惊加密货币市场之前欺诈投资者。【原文：Attorneys for Terraform Labs and its founder Do Kwon are expected to give closing arguments on Friday at a trial on claims that Terraform and Kwon defrauded investors before the collapse of their stablecoin shocked cryptocurrency markets in 2022.】

item.title: 早间竞价地缘政治、原油和薪资水平让今天变得忙碌起来
item.description: 阿伦-约翰（Alun John）对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Alun John.】

item.title: 工会称意大利 Stellantis 第一季度产量下降 10
item.description: FIM-CISL工会周五表示，Stellantis意大利工厂今年前三个月的乘用车和货车产量同比下降9.8%，降至170,415辆。【原文：Production of passenger cars and vans at Stellantis' Italian plants fell 9.8% year-on-year in the first three months of this year to 170,415 units, the FIM-CISL union said on Friday.】

item.title: 受降息前景和中国数据影响，3 月份外资流入亚洲股市激增
item.description: 在主要央行采取宽松货币政策和中国经济指标向好的前景下，3 月份海外投资者对亚洲股市的需求强劲，创下了三年多来外资流入最好的一个季度。【原文：Asian stocks saw robust demand from overseas investors in March, marking their best quarter for foreign inflows in over three years, amid prospects of accommodative monetary policies from major central banks and positive Chinese economic indicators.】

item.title: 调查显示，英国建筑业自 2023 年 8 月以来首次实现增长
item.description: 周五的一项调查显示，英国建筑业上个月出现了自 8 月份以来的首次扩张，尽管扩张幅度很小，这为 2023 年下半年经济衰退后的改善增添了一些迹象。【原文：Britain's construction industry expanded last month for the first time since August, albeit only slightly, according to a survey on Friday that added to signs of improvement in the economy after a recession in the second half of 2023.】

item.title: 富士康第一季度营收同比下降 9.6%，第二季度实现增长
item.description: 全球最大的合约电子制造商、苹果公司最大的 iPhone 组装商--台湾富士康周五公布的第一季度财报显示，该公司第一季度营收同比下降 9.6%，但预计第二季度营收将同比增长。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker and Apple's biggest iPhone assembler, on Friday reported first quarter revenue fell 9.6% year-on-year, but predicted second quarter revenue would rise year-on-year.】

item.title: 宜家商场业主英卡寻求在韩国和日本拓展绿色能源业务
item.description: 英卡公司投资部门负责人表示，该公司正在韩国和日本寻求首个可再生能源投资机会，其中海上风电是最有前景的选择。【原文：Ingka, which owns the majority of IKEA stores worldwide, is seeking its first renewable investment opportunities in South Korea and Japan, with offshore wind the most promising option, the head of its investment arm said.】

item.title: 第一季度流向科技股的资金创下历史第三高纪录 - 美国银行
item.description: 美国银行全球研究公司周五表示，今年第一季度科技股流入资金达186亿美元，是有记录以来第三大季度流入资金，在过去一周也吸引了资金，同时还有大量资金流向现金和债券。【原文：Tech stocks saw inflows of $18.6 billion in the first quarter of the year, the third largest quarterly inflow on record, and also attracted funds in the past week, along with large flows to cash and bonds, Bank of America Global Research said Friday.】

item.title: 欧盟委员会审查有关匈牙利对外国零售商征税的投诉
item.description: 在路透社看到奥地利政府和奥地利零售商 Spar 在信中反对匈牙利对零售商征税后，欧盟委员会正在调查有关匈牙利征税的投诉，并表示将 "确保采取适当的后续行动"。【原文：The European Commission is looking into a complaint about Hungary's tax on retailers, saying it will "ensure appropriate follow-up" after the Austrian government and Austrian retailer Spar objected to the policy in letters seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 壳牌第一季度综合天然气业绩下降
item.description: 壳牌周五表示，其综合天然气部门第一季度的交易业绩预计将大大低于第四季度。【原文：Shell said on Friday that first-quarter trading results for its integrated gas division are expected to be significantly lower than the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 日本巧合指数下滑，显示经济势头减弱
item.description: 日本政府周五公布的数据显示，衡量日本经济健康状况的一项指数在 2 月份连续第二个月下降，这表明日本在第四季度以微弱优势避免了经济衰退之后，经济增长势头正在减弱。【原文：An index measuring the health of Japan's economy fell for the second straight month in February, government data showed on Friday, in a sign of weakening momentum after the country narrowly avoided a recession in the fourth quarter.】
